summary: A documentary about branding, advertising and product placement that is financed and made possible by brands, advertising and product placement.
cast: J.J. Abrams|Peter Berg|Paul Brennan|Noam Chomsky|Jimmy Kimmel|Rick Kurnit|Mark Crispin Miller|Ralph Nader|Brett Ratner|L.A. Reid|Morgan Spurlock|Quentin Tarantino|Donald Trump|John Wells
title: La historia más grande jamás vendida
